items.media_title: How to Create Flawless Natural Makeup
items.description:
1. Apply yellow concealer underneath the eyes and on any dark spots (For fair skin, use pink).
2. Apply a second layer of concealer in your own skin tone on top of the first to even out the shade.
3. Apply cream blush to the apples of the cheeks and blend.
4. Apply contour powder beneath the cheekbones.
5. Use short, hair-like strokes with a pencil to fill in sparse brows.
6. Finish look with lip balm and mascara.
items.keywords: cosmo, cosmopolitan, syndicatable, makeup, beauty tutorial, beauty, cosmo quickie, natural makeup, color correction, how to color correct
items.title: How to Create Flawless Natural Makeup
